results.definition: the effort contributed by a person in bringing about a result
examples: I am proud of my contribution in advancing the project

results.definition: act of giving in common with others for a common purpose especially to a charity
a voluntary gift (as of money or service or ideas) made to some worthwhile cause

examples: he expected his contribution to be repaid with interest

results.definition: a writing for publication especially one of a collection of writings as an article or story
